comments.body: It's easier to follow these tests when they are broken down into smaller cases. That also gives us an opportunity to provide an opportunity to give a good name to the case we're verifying. For example, `testCreatePartitionsWithInvalidReplicaAssignment` or `testCreatePartitionsWithSmallerPartitionCount`.
Part of the goal here is to verify that the batch operation works, though.  If all the cases were split into separate functions we would not get that validation.
